user_inputs.content: Identified inconsistent session dumping behavior - natural flow too unpredictable, needs cleanup and more consistent triggering
Need to clean up and implement consistent session dump triggering

ai_responses.content: Created SessionDumpTrigger system to replace inconsistent automatic session boundary detection with explicit, deterministic session dumping
Implemented cleanup script to disable problematic automatic session detection and created comprehensive instructions for manual session dumping

decisions.decision: Replace automatic session detection with explicit triggers
decisions.rationale: User feedback indicated natural flow was too inconsistent and unpredictable
decisions.impact: Provides complete control over when session dumps are created

decisions.decision: Disable session boundary detector and hourglass interference
decisions.rationale: Multiple competing systems caused unpredictable behavior

decisions.decision: Maintain 3-tier memory system with explicit triggering
decisions.rationale: Core memory architecture works well, just needs consistent triggering
decisions.impact: Preserves all memory management benefits with predictable control

insights: Automatic session detection created more problems than it solved
Explicit control over session boundaries improves user experience
3-tier memory system works perfectly with manual triggering
Simple, deterministic systems are more reliable than complex heuristics
technical_work: Created SessionDumpTrigger class for explicit session dump creation
Fixed session dump format to match SessionDumpManager expectations
Created cleanup script and comprehensive documentation
Tested session dump processing through 3-tier system
next_steps: Use explicit session dump triggering going forward
Create session dumps at natural conversation boundaries
Continue leveraging 3-tier memory system for optimal token efficiency
